(OOC: I am going to assume that Rat trap and Windlord are inside the wall
s=
ince there are no power boxes on the outside of it, at least not down at
gr=
ound level)

<NEW>

As Rat Trap and Windlord hold up inside the small crawl=
 space inside the
wall, a distinct beep can be heard, and then the slight h=
issing noise of a
door opening and then closing again. As Rat Trap attempts=
 to nibble through
a few wires, outside of their little hole quiet footstep=
s can be heard.

Suddenly it appears that Rat Trap=92s nibbling bears fruit=
 as there is a
slight popping sound and then everything goes dark!

=93SCRA=
P!=94 said a voice that sounded a lot like Scourge from the hallway
outside=
 Rat Trap=92s and Windlord=92s crawl space. =93BAH! I don=92t need light to=

find vermin.=94 Scourge said, obviously upset by the sudden darkness.

Aft=
er a few seconds emergency lights kicked in and dim lights can be seen
comi=
ng from the hallway. =93Ahh, heh heh, but it does come in handy.=94
Scourge=
=92s voice said from the outside.

Then there is a pause, =93Oy, what is th=
is?=94 a note of curiousity in Scourge=92s
tones as his voice sounded as if=
 it had come closer to Rat Trap and
Windlord's crawl space.

(TAG)

*******=
**************************************

Meanwhile back at the battle scene =
the battle between Tuscon and Hydras
escalates as the mighty Autobot warrio=
r battles against the leader of the
Predacon forces! Blade meets armored fl=
esh as teeth and fire blast away
against Tucson=92s protective skin!

As Hy=
dras and Tuscon battle it out, Deepstryke hovers in the air in cannon
mode =
apparently directing matters. Occasionally his cannon rips loose with
firep=
ower, but for the most part his sensors strobe over the battle field as
he =
transmitted orders to different ones.

Phobia Swung up into the air to avoi=
d the returning fire of the maximals and
Autobots, peals of laughter follow=
ing her as she did so. Yes, she was in her
element, she just loved causing =
fear and demoralizing an enemy! As she
flipped through the air her auto-gun=
s began to glow as she came through on
another strafing run, however this t=
ime instead of her special shells she
opened up with pure firepower and let=
 hundreds of bullets open up on the
Maximals below!

Meanwhile Insecticon, =
Bruticus-X, Iguanus and Inferno who were the nearest
to Hydras also came to=
 help their commander.

=93You will bow to my lord!=94 Inferno said, his bo=
osters holding him in the air
as he opened up on Tuscon with a spray of bul=
lets! At the same time
Insecticon, Bruticus and Iguanus landed on the groun=
d looking as if they
were ready to begin grappling with the Tuscon.

The Fu=
zors: Skyshadow, Injector, Buzzclaw, Terrorgator, and Quickstrike
quickly m=
ake their power felt on Kup, Talon, Nightshift!

=93Quickstrike! TERRORIZE!=
" Quickstrike screams in glee as he transformed into
his  scorpion/snake mo=
de and landed on the ground! "YEEEHAAW!" He belowed as
he began crawling to=
wards Kup.

At the same time Buzzclaw and Terrogator went after Talon and N=
ightshift
chuckling.

Skyshadow merely laughed as he stood with his arms fo=
lded, =93This will be
over very soon Maximals.=94 He said evilly. =93If you=
 stand still it will be
quicker.=94

From overhead Terrorsaur and Waspinato=
r watched, the sweeps pulling in
around them, all of them having their guns=
 trained on those below.

As valiant and stalwart as the Autobots and Maxim=
als are it is obvious that
they are HEAVILY outnumbered, each person having=
 to fight two if not more!!

(TAG)

***************************************=
*

> <OLD>
>
> Back at the Ark, Quickstride suddenly realizes that his stin=
ky surprise
goes terribly wrong.
>
> "Ooooops.... I sooo didn't mean to do =
that.... Awww geeze, I meant ta hit
whoever it is that's spyn' on us, not y=
ou guys... It's a good thing I carry
an oxygen reversal to my noxious attac=
ks. "
>
> From his mouth, he blows fresh oxygen into the air, where he had =
let loose
his cloud of gas, hoping that it would help rather than harm the =
creatures
around him. All the while, still keeping an ear out for danger.

=
<NEW>

Soon enough the area around Quickstride freshens and things appear t=
o return
to relative normal. The birds and Squirrel quickly regain the sens=
es with
the air from Quickstride. However there are some angry chirps and c=
hitters
from them as they scurried and flew off to find new roosts!

For a =
brief moment everything is relatively calm and quiet. Birds begin to
chip o=
nce more, slight breezes begin to blow wiping away the last vestiges
of Qui=
ckstride's stink bomb. Except for the battle happening hundreds of
miles aw=
ay all seems right with the world . . . .

. . . That is until the Ark's ma=
in doors slide shut and from the CLUNK-THUNK
sound they have locked!

At th=
e same time the shielding begins to buzz oddly as if . . .

  . . .   as if=
 it has changed some how . . .
               . . .  as if it no longer car=
ed if you were a Maximal . . .
                                     . . . a=
s if it was going to keep
EVERYONE out!!!

(TAG)

Preston

--0022150482bb49381c0499bd945a
